meanings.sent1: The rain discontinues before the sun comes out.
meanings.sent2: She discontinues playing the piano when her fingers get tired.
meanings.sent3: The cat discontinues chasing the laser pointer when it realizes it can't catch it.
meanings.sent4: His interest in the book discontinues abruptly when he reaches the last page.
meanings.sent5: The teacher discontinues speaking when the students start to listen attentively.

meanings.sent1: The music discontinues suddenly, leaving the room in silence.
meanings.sent2: He discontinues running when he reaches the finish line.
meanings.sent3: The clock discontinues ticking when its batteries run out.
meanings.sent4: The car discontinues moving as soon as the driver hits the brakes.
meanings.sent5: The conversation discontinues as soon as the topic becomes too controversial.

meanings.sent1: The abrupt discontinues of the movie left the audience puzzled.
meanings.sent2: The unexpected discontinues of the party surprised everyone.
meanings.sent3: The sudden discontinues of the game caused confusion among the players.
meanings.sent4: The premature discontinues of the concert disappointed the fans.
meanings.sent5: The inevitable discontinues of summer marked the beginning of fall.
